title: Klondike Gold Rush - Seattle Unit National Historical Park: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Are you looking to be more involved with the Seattle Unit of the Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park? The park offers volunteer opportunities, for everything from staffing visitor centers, riding Amtrak trains, and administrative duties.  NPS Centennial The National Park Service turns 100 on August 25, 2016. As we lead up to the centennial, we invite you to participate in Find Your Park Experiences to learn, discover, be inspired, or simply have fun in national parks.  Volunteer Volunteering is fun, makes a difference, allows you to meet new people, and give back to the community!  Work With Us A wide variety of exciting and challenging employment opportunities await you at Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park.   Planning  View a variety of public planning documents, including a Klondike Gold Rush NHP Centennial Strategy.
